about_the_game:
Show your resourcefulness and fight through anything with the Duct Taped Skin Set. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

The Duct Taped Weapon Skin can be equipped in the Loadout menu for the Insurgent faction for the following weapons:

- Rifleman/Demolitions: AR-7090
- Advisor: ACE52
- Gunner: RPK
- Breacher: KS23
- Marksman: M1 Garand
- Secondary: M1911

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase and can be combined with other cosmetic gear pieces. They can be equipped in-game in the Customization menu, which can be accessed from the main menu.

The Duct Taped Weapon Skin Set is included in the Resurgence Set Bundle.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
